data.name: Pandaren
data.description:
Pandaren

Units:
+5% hit points
3x damage roll interval

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Traits: Very random and unpredictable chance based commbat skills. Everything is left to the dice roll, nothing depends on you. So just kick back and relax, sip your drink and enjoy the show.

Difficulty: Beginer

auras.name: Hypersense Aura
auras.description:
Reveals entire map
Reveals invisible units
(10000 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Static Aura
auras.description:
-10% unit attack rate
(affects non-Hero units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Endurance Aura
auras.description:
+15% unit attack and move speed
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Village Guardians [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Dragon Style

Reduces spell damage to Weaponsmith, Martial Artist, Brewmaster and Sumo Wrestler by 20%. Increases their armor by 2.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: White Tiger Master [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Tiger Style

White Tiger Master replaces Weaponsmith
Melee Unit
+4 damage
+2 armor
Abilities:
Flurry (Self Spell)
(+100% AS for 5 sec)
Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)
(15% damage in 125 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Hand-to-Hand Combat
Cloth Armor
Tiger Style
Serpent Style
Crane Style
Dragon Style

Type: Early Push

units.name: White Tiger Master
units.description:
Melee Unit
Strong Vs Ranged Unit
Weak Vs Spellcaster

bonuses.name: Jade Serpent Master [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Serpent Style

Jade Serpent Master replaces Weaponsmith
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
+4 damage
Abilities:
Snake Bite (Passive Skill)
(15% for 1 sec stun)
(affects strong creeps only)
(affects organic units only)
Ultimate Defence (Passive Skill)
(30% to reduce damage to 30)
(blocks damage above 30)
(affects strong creeps only)
Upgrades used:
Hand-to-Hand Combat
Cloth Armor
Tiger Style
Serpent Style
Crane Style
Dragon Style

Type: Anti Heavy Creeps

units.name: Jade Serpent Master
units.description:
Melee Unit
Strong Vs Ranged Unit
Weak Vs Spellcaster

bonuses.name: Red Crane Master [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Ricochet
+1 level of Crane Style

Red Crane Master replaces Martial Artist
Ranged Unit
-4 damage
+20% attack rate
Abilities:
Shuriken (Damage Spell)
(300 damage to 1 Air unit)
Mirror Image (Self Spell)
(1 illusion for 30 sec)
(illusions deal no damage)
Upgrades used:
Throwing Weapons
Cloth Armor
Tiger Style
Ricochet
Crane Style
Dragon Style

Type: Anti Air

units.name: Red Crane Master
units.description:
Ranged Unit
Strong Vs Spellcaster
Weak Vs Melee Unit

bonuses.name: Potionmaster [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Taste My Brew

Potionmaster replaces Brewmaster
Spellcaster
+2 armor
+50 MP
Abilities:
Detox Potion (Disable Spell)
(dispels only negative buffs)
(20/15/10/5 sec cooldown)
(affects friendly organic units only)
Healing Salve (Healing Spell)
(75/100/125/150 HP over 12 sec)
(affects organic units only)
Upgrades used:
Brewing (Upgrades Abilities)
Cloth Armor
Crane Style
Taste My Brew
Dragon Style

Type: Anti Buff / Healing

units.name: Potionmaster
units.description:
Spellcaster
Strong Vs Melee Unit
Weak Vs Ranged Unit

Ox Style

Type: Late Game Push

units.name: Hwacha
units.description:
Artillery Unit
Strong Vs Buildings
Weak Vs All Units

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [C]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [V]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Special Unit.

spells.name: Pawn Item [A]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [S]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Agility Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [D]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Intelligence Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [F]
spells.description: Sell Lv2 item from Special Unit.

bonuses.name: Anti-Magic Shield [C]
bonuses.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.
Has Global Silence and Mana Leak Aura.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Anti-Magic Shield
spells.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Global Silence (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Silences enemy units and structures for 10 sec.
(does not affect Special unit)
Cooldown: 180 seconds.

spells.name: Mana Leak Aura
spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+20% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.name: Cripple (Lv1) [W]
spells.description:
Reduces damage by 25% for 60 sec.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

towerUpgrades.name: Tiger Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance for bonus damage
Affects: Weaponsmith and Martial Artist

Lv1: 9% to do 2x damage
Lv2: 18% to do 2x damage
Lv3: 27% to do 2x damage
Lv4: 36% to do 2x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Serpent Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to disarm
Affects: Weaponsmith
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 7% chance for 1.5 sec
Lv2: 14% chance for 1.5 sec
Lv3: 21% chance for 1.5 sec
Lv4: 28% chance for 1.5 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Ricochet
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bouncing projectyles
Affects: Martial Artist and Watch Tower
(35% damage loss per bounce)
(does not affect buildings)

Lv1: 1 bounce
Lv2: 2 bounces
Lv3: 3 bounces
Lv4: 4 bounces

towerUpgrades.name: Crane Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increases base evasion
Affects: Weaponsmith, Martial Artist and Brewmaster

Lv1: +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% evasion

towerUpgrades.name: Ox Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun
Affects: Sumo Wrestler and Turtlerider
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 0.5s duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 9% chance for 1 sec stun
Lv2: 18% chance for 1 sec stun
Lv3: 27% chance for 1 sec stun
Lv4: 36% chance for 1 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Turtle Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to block damage
Affects: Sumo Wrestler and Turtlerider

Lv1: 9% to block 20 damage
Lv2: 18% to block 30 damage
Lv3: 27% to block 40 damage
Lv4: 36% to block 50 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Devour
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to kill instantly
Affects: Cloud Serpent
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
(affects summoned Cloud Serpents)

Lv1: 8% to kill instantly
Lv2: 16% to kill instantly
Lv3: 24% to kill instantly
Lv4: 32% to kill instantly

spells.name: Death From Afar (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reveals other player bases and deals 600 damage every 300 seconds to all enemy buildings.

Type: Super Weapon

towerUpgrades.name: Taste My Brew
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to curse for 10 sec
Affects: Brewmaster
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 9% for 20% miss
Lv2: 18% for 20% miss
Lv3: 27% for 20% miss
Lv4: 36% for 20% miss

towerUpgrades.name: Dragon Style
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: HP and damage
Affects: All non-Hero units
(affects organic units only)
(affects summoned Cloud Serpents)

Lv1: +25 HP and +4 damage
Lv2: +50 HP and +8 damage
Lv3: +75 HP and +12 damage
Lv4: +100 HP and +16 damage

t1spell.name: A Few Fireworks [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Holy Fire [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends fireworks in at enemies.
Each firework deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: A Few Fireworks [Z]
skills.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

skills.name: Holy Fire [X]
skills.description:
Sends fireworks in at enemies.
Each firework deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: The Horde - Pandaren
skills.description:
Units:
+5% hit points
3x damage roll interval

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Traits: Very random and unpredictable chance based commbat skills. Everything is left to the dice roll, nothing depends on you. So just kick back and relax, sip your drink and enjoy the show.

Difficulty: Beginer

skills.name: Sacrifice Ritual [C]
skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

barrack.name: Pagoda (Lv2)
barrack.description:
Gives:
Can train Heroes
+750 hit points
+2 armor
+7% unit spawning rate
+1 Melee Unit
+2 Siege Units

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:
Restores 100 HP over 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: Fluffy Teddy
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Butt Drop (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4 sec stun
(250-400 area of effect)

Ruined Voice (Disable Spell)
8 sec taunt and +20 armor
(550-700 area of effect)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Thick Layer of Fat (Passive Skill)
35% to block 20-50 damage

Butt Spin (Damage Spell)
100-160 damage/sec for 5 sec

heroes.name: Legendary Brewmaster
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Breath of Fire (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line

Taste My Brew (Disable Skill)
20-40% miss chance in an area

Drunken Brawler (Passive Skill)
10-30% evasion and 2x crit

Storm, Earth And Fire (Self Spell)
splits into 3 units for 20-30 sec

heroes.name: Serpent Tamer
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Fireworks (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(125-275 area of effect)

Special Brew Tonic (Support Spell)
2-8 armor bonus
(600-750 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Inspiration Aura (Support Aura)
13-25% damage bonus

Serpent Mistress (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 Serpents for 30-90 sec

heroes.name: Ancient Dragon Turtle
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Deafening Roar (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage, 14-26% slow
(300-600 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Craggy Skin (Passive Skill)
150-180 dmg to melee attacker

Devour (Passive Skill)
24-36% to kill instantly
(affects non-Hero units only)

Stone Skin (Passive Skill)
20-34% to block an attack

magic.name: Brewing (Lv1) [W]
magic.description:
Gives:
Brewmaster can use Cask of Ale
+10% damage to 1 unit
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
+12 Brewmaster damage
+0.25 MP/sec Brewmaster mana reg

magic.description:

magic.description:

Brewmaster can use Viper Concoction
-8 armor in 200 AoE
(does not affect Special unit)
+12 Brewmaster damage
+0.25 MP/sec Brewmaster mana reg

Mists of Pandaria
